Uses of Class
io.helidon.security.jwt.JwtHeaders.Builder

  • Packages that use JwtHeaders.Builder 
    Package Description
    io.helidon.security.jwt
    JWT (JSON web token) support.

    • Uses of JwtHeaders.Builder in io.helidon.security.jwt

      Methods in io.helidon.security.jwt that return JwtHeaders.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      JwtHeaders.Builder JwtHeaders.Builder.addHeaderAudience​(String audience)
      Audience identifies the expected recipients of this JWT (optional).
      JwtHeaders.Builder JwtHeaders.Builder.addHeaderClaim​(String claim, Object value)
      Add a header claim.
      JwtHeaders.Builder JwtHeaders.Builder.algorithm​(String algorithm)
      The "alg" claim is used to define the signature algorithm.
      static JwtHeaders.Builder JwtHeaders.builder()
      Create a new builder for header claims.
      JwtHeaders.Builder JwtHeaders.Builder.contentType​(String contentType)
      This header claim should only be used when nesting or encrypting JWT.
      JwtHeaders.Builder JwtHeaders.Builder.encryption​(String encryption)
      Encryption algorithm to use.
      JwtHeaders.Builder JwtHeaders.Builder.headerAudience​(List<String> audience)
      Audience identifies the expected recipients of this JWT (optional).
      JwtHeaders.Builder JwtHeaders.Builder.headerIssuer​(String issuer)
      The issuer claim identifies the principal that issued the JWT.
      JwtHeaders.Builder JwtHeaders.Builder.headerSubject​(String subject)
      Subject defines the principal this JWT was issued for (e.g.
      JwtHeaders.Builder JwtHeaders.Builder.keyId​(String keyId)
      Key id to be used to sign/verify this JWT.
      JwtHeaders.Builder JwtHeaders.Builder.type​(String type)
      Type of this JWT.
